title: no daily quest today?
body: I don't see a daily quest in my missions today and it looks like I still only have 10 tickets so I couldn't have completed it without realizing it.

replies.body: The first daily quest was designed to last a little over a full day in order to allow plenty of time for everyone to complete that mission and start the other mission lines. Starting tomorrow everyone who bought one of the passes should be getting the daily's every day.
If you could elaborate on that, do you mean that people will be getting missions that aren't related to the 5 Arcade Levels (Blitzcrank, Veigar, Brand, Malazhar, Ziggs)?
The 5 mission lines you just stated are the 'other mission lines' I was referring to.
So then does that mean that even players who didn't pay for the Brand, Malzhar and Ziggs missions are going to be getting them for free starting tomorrow? Sorry if my question was confusing Broporo.

No worries, I'm here to help clear up any and all confusion when needed ^_^!

So everyone will have access to the Blitz and Veigar mission lines. The other 3 mission lines and Dailies are exclusive to the Dungeon Pass holders, and the Dailies can be started by anyone who bought either pass.

Good to know. I appreciate the clarification because the flavor text was a bit ambiguous on the announcement page. It stated that people who bought the dungeon pass would have access to daily missions but I don't think it mentioned anything about those who didn't buy it. I just sort of assumed we'd all be getting daily missions because of the VS event. Makes a lot more sense now though.
The daily missions are unlocked by purchasing one of the dungeon passes, either the mini one or the big one. They're separate from the arcade levels and each give 10 tickets for 1 win.
